elements.name: Verify API: getSectorCount API return Total Sector Count

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getSectorCount"
User calls "getSectorCount" API with "Get" http Request
Verify sector_Count result is greater than 0
The API call is success with StatusCode 200

elements.name: Verify API: createSector API add Sector paylod

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Add" Sector Payload
User calls "createSector" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return Sector instance
Verify Total sector_Count increased by 1

elements.name: Verify API: createSector API with no sector Body

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Add" Sector Payload  with no Sector Body and Param = "none"
User calls "createSector" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 400

"message" in response body is "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.sector.entity.Sector com.ibm.dc.sector.controller.SectorController.createSector(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.sector.entity.Sector)"

arguments.val: "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.sector.entity.Sector com.ibm.dc.sector.controller.SectorController.createSector(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.sector.entity.Sector)"

elements.name: Verify API: getAllSectors API return List of All Sectors

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getAllSectors"
User calls "getAllSectors" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Sectors
Total number of Sector in List is equal to getSectorCount
Sector added exist in returned SectorList

elements.name: Verify API: getSectorBySearchCriteria API, search no SearchCriteria

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getSectorBySearchCriteria"
User calls "getSectorBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Sectors
All Sectors should have Active Status

elements.name: Verify API: getSectorBySearchCriteria API, search by 'searchId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getSectorBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "sectorId"
User calls "getSectorBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Sectors
Response should be list of Sectors and size should be one
Sector added exist in returned SectorList

elements.name: Verify API: getSectorBySearchCriteria API, search by 'sectorName'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getSectorBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "sectorName"
User calls "getSectorBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Sectors
Sector added exist in returned SectorList

elements.name: Verify API: getSectorBySearchCriteria API, search by 'sectorId' & 'sectorName'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getSectorBySearchCriteria with Parameter: 'sectorId' & 'sectorName'
User calls "getSectorBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Sectors
Response should be list of Sectors and size should be one
Sector added exist in returned SectorList

elements.name: Verify API: getSectorBySearchCriteria API, search by invalid 'sectorId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getSectorBySearchCriteria" with invalid Parameter: "sectorId" = "-9"
User calls "getSectorBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Sectors with zero records

elements.name: Verify API: getTaskBySearchCriteria API, search by invalid 'taskDescription'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getTaskBySearchCriteria" with invalid Parameter: "taskDescription" = "invalidDescriptionName"
User calls "getTaskBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Sectors with zero records

elements.name: Verify API: deleteSector update Sector status as Passive

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke deleteSector with Parameter: "sectorId"
User calls "deleteSector" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify "SectorStatus" of particular "Sector" updated as Passive

elements.name: Verify API: deleteSector API,  with invalid sectorId

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "deleteSector" with invalid Parameter: "sectorId" = "-9"
User calls "deleteSector" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 500
"message" in response body is "Sector with id - -9 not found"

elements.name: Verify API: deleteSector API, with no Param

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "deleteSector" with no Param
User calls "deleteSector" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 400
"message" in response body is "Required Integer parameter 'sectorId' is not present"

elements.name: Verify API: updateSector API add Sector paylod

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Update" Sector Payload
User calls "updateSector" API with "Put" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify 'sectorName','sectorStatus','sectorCreatedBy','sectorCreatedAt' gets updated

elements.name: Verify API: updateSector API, with no pattern Body

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Update" Sector Payload  with no Sector Body and Param = "sectorId"
User calls "updateSector" API with "Put" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 400

"message" in response body is "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.sector.entity.Sector com.ibm.dc.sector.controller.SectorController.updateSector(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.sector.entity.Sector)"

arguments.val: "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.sector.entity.Sector com.ibm.dc.sector.controller.SectorController.updateSector(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.sector.entity.Sector)"
